name: Infection Rate
description: 3rd person Co-op Zombie Survival with multiplayer
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 280 or ATI analog with at least 1GB Ram and DirectX9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i3 / i5 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 550Ti or ATI analog with at least 1GB Ram and DirectX11 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
